item.title: SCVX Corp 10-K
item.description: SCVX Corp, which is in the Special Industry Machinery, Nec [3559] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 28, 2022 had 35999 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 941 instances combination - 715 instances initial - 595 instances shares - 550 instances may - 540 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
